title: Why do some people think that school is boring? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my career I was either a principal/assistant principal/Spanish teacher/bilingual aide. I have worked at schools from Texas all the way to California. If you think school is boring, please understand, in the schools I work students were taught as if everyone in the room had the intelligence of the slowest person in the room. This is because you must make every student feel they can do anything
